channel.title: Couple of 317 and 508 Questions
channel.description: Ok yall, you know on real runescape how tai bwo wanni village has the little mini game where you take logs and make up a wall for points? well can i have a few hints on how to do this, i mean like, whenever you click on the wall to board it up, it takes out some spars, and builds up the wall (and give stuff but thats easy). well i want to know how to do this, and it doesnt even have to show you building it up, just make it higher and higher. It may not even be possible in Moparscape or Silabsoft, but its worth a try :)

item.title: Couple of 317 and 508 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Just use the itemonobject method and have an ant called like taibwofavour and have it like

if(useitem == 965 && objectid == 1503){ taibwofavour +=1; deleteitem(965, 1); }

Something like that should work and maybe have it do this

sendMessage("Your Favour points now =  +taibwofavour+");

Btw I made up the idâ€™s so dont use those lol

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of 317 and 508 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Do you mean just when you repair the wall you want it to remove the spars and add some points to your total score?

Read full topic
